text: I'm taking my 2-year-old out for coffee. She gets fussy in places that aren't set up for little ones, and honestly any place with screens becomes a battle - she gets glued to them and then melts down when we leave. I'm also a realist though - if she starts throwing a tantrum, I need to be able to just grab our drinks without unbuckling her from the car seat.

I am celebrating the holiday and want somewhere with that trendy vibe - you know, the kind of place that's Instagram-worthy. I am going to be biking over so I need somewhere to lock up. It's supposed to be cold so I'll have a heavy coat and would need a place to hang it. And I'll definitely want to post photos so reliable internet is a must.

Heading out for drinks on a cold winter evening. I'll be bundled up so I need somewhere I can stash my coat. I'm in the mood for proper cocktails, not just beer or wine. And I want somewhere with that indie, alternative vibe.

Taking my kids out after their game. They're pretty rowdy so we need somewhere that can handle some noise and energy, and it should be a place that's okay with younger crowds. They'll want to catch highlights on a screen while we're there. They always want to stay outside if there is outdoor seating, but I definitely want them to stay inside since it's freezing out, so find a place without outdoor seating.
Planning a study session with my classmates. We need somewhere quiet and good for groups. No reservations needed - we want to just walk in. Indoor-only since we'll be there a while.

I'm a writer looking for a place to work on my novel with my writing group. I need somewhere dog-friendly so I can bring my golden retriever, quiet for concentration, and good for groups since we sometimes do peer reviews.
Throwing a birthday brunch for my friend. We're all biking over so bike parking is a must. We want somewhere trendy for photos. It should be BYOB so we can bring our own champagne.

I'm doing a digital detox day and want to disconnect completely. Need a cafe without WiFi so I'm not tempted. I prefer indoor-only seating, and somewhere that's not aimed at kids - I want an adult atmosphere.

Caught in the rain during our dog walk with the kids. I need somewhere dog-friendly and kid-friendly. Budget-friendly prices would be great. Indoor-only seating since it's pouring. Takeout option in case we need to leave quickly.
I'm an Instagram influencer scouting new photo locations. Need somewhere trendy for the aesthetic, quiet so I can focus on content, and budget-friendly since I'm bootstrapping my brand.

I love discovering local bands. Looking for a cafe with a casual atmosphere where people mention live music in their reviews. No reservations needed - I like to just show up. Without WiFi so I can fully enjoy the performance.
I'm a dessert lover on a mission. Need a mid-priced cafe with takeout where reviews mention gelato. Has to be good for lunch too.
Wine enthusiast here. Looking for a cafe where reviews mention it's a wine bar. Without TVs for a refined atmosphere. Needs delivery and takeout options. Takes reservations for special occasions.

Brunch connoisseur seeking the perfect challah French toast. Need a cafe with free WiFi where reviews mention challah. Good for breakfast, without TVs for a calm vibe, and offers delivery for lazy Sundays.
Taking my pup everywhere I go. Need a dog-friendly cafe with TVs to catch games. Takeout for busy days. Casual atmosphere. Looking for reviews that mention dog friendly. Must accept credit cards.
shorthand: AND(dogs_allowed, dog_friendly_reviews, has_tv, takeout, casual_vibe, credit_cards)

text: Total matcha addict here. Looking for a mid-priced cafe where reviews mention matcha latte. Without TVs so I can enjoy my drink in peace.

Night owl looking for late-night caffeine. Need a kid-friendly cafe that's wheelchair accessible with free WiFi. Looking for reviews mentioning midnight hours. Takes reservations for late-night study groups.
Foodie searching for the best banh mi in town. Need a cafe with coat check, mid-priced, bike parking. Reviews should mention banh mi. Good for brunch too.
Love dining al fresco. Looking for a cafe with free WiFi, casual atmosphere, where reviews mention terrace seating. Good for breakfast.
Pet owner on a budget. Looking for a cafe where reviews mention you can bring your dog. Budget-friendly prices. Accepts credit cards.

Early bird looking for a productive workspace. Need a quiet, budget-friendly cafe that's not kid-friendly - I want focus time. Bike parking for my commute. Must be open on Monday from 7:00 AM to 8:00 AM.
Planning a Friday wine evening with friends. Need a cafe with beer and wine, without TVs for conversation. Must be open on Friday from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM.
Sunday morning dog walk ritual. Looking for a dog-friendly, quiet cafe with takeout. Must be open on Sunday from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM.
Hosting a Monday afternoon party. Need somewhere lively with a full bar, casual dress code. Must be open on Monday from 2:00 PM to 4:00 PM.
Early Friday brunch with the pup. Need a dog-friendly cafe with outdoor seating, casual atmosphere. Must accept credit cards and be open on Friday from 7:00 AM to 9:00 AM.
Looking for a late night Friday spot. Needs to be lively, without WiFi so I can be present. Must be open on Friday from 10:00 PM to 1:00 AM.
Midweek lunch with my dog. Looking for a dog-friendly, quiet cafe with outdoor seating. Must be open on Wednesday from 12:00 PM to 2:00 PM.
Friday night plans on the patio. Need a full bar, outdoor seating, moderate noise level. Takes reservations. Must be open on Friday from 9:00 PM to 11:00 PM.
Sunday family outing with the kids. Need somewhere kid-friendly with a full bar for the adults, outdoor seating, and happy hour deals. Must be open on Sunday from 12:00 PM to 5:00 PM.
Indoor Sunday family gathering. Need somewhere kid-friendly with a full bar. Without outdoor seating since weather's iffy. Must be open on Sunday from 12:00 PM to 5:00 PM.
Recent favorite hunting. Need a cafe without alcohol, indoor-only, where recent reviews since 2020 are very positive.
Post-pandemic gem discovery. Looking for a classy atmosphere with happy hour, where recent reviews since 2020 are very positive.
Critic-approved only. Need a cafe without alcohol, quiet atmosphere, where even critical reviewers rate it well.
Quality-tested spot hunting. Looking for no dogs allowed, adult-oriented vibes, where even critical reviewers rate it well.
Active spot with good buzz. Need a full bar, casual atmosphere, with strong recent activity of 4+ reviews since 2020.
Current buzz chasing. Looking for a cafe without alcohol, hipster vibe, with strong recent activity of 4+ reviews since 2020.
Genuine quality search. Need beer and wine, without TVs. Want somewhere that's not just praised by easy raters.

evidence.description: NOT praised only by easy raters

text: Winter evening plans. Looking for a full bar with coat check for my heavy jacket.
Active spot for my crew. Need BYOB, dogs allowed, and a classy vibe.
Genuine quality quest. Looking for no alcohol, dogs allowed, wheelchair accessible, mid-priced, and trendy.
Casual evening out. Need a place that either serves beer and wine or is good for late night, and is either quiet or has a touristy vibe.
Veggie-friendly drinks needed. Looking for either a diner or a place that serves alcohol, and is either vegetarian or has an upscale vibe.
Bike commuter stop. Need a place without outdoor seating, with bike parking. Should either allow dogs or serve alcohol, and have either free WiFi or be good for late night.
shorthand: AND(no_OutdoorSeating, BikeParking, OR(DogsAllowed, Alcohol), OR(wifi_'free', goodformeal_latenight))

text: Creative cafe hopping. Looking for a themed cafe that's either arts & entertainment or good for late night, and either not good for breakfast or has a romantic vibe.
Upscale Mediterranean craving. Need either a Mediterranean place or an upscale spot, that has either a full bar or serves alcohol.
Quiet shopping break. Either a shopping spot or a place that serves alcohol, and is either quiet or has a touristy vibe.
Vegan date night. Need either a coat check or a place that serves alcohol, and is either vegan or has a romantic vibe.
Classic American brunch. Looking for a traditional American place that either serves bagels or has an upscale vibe, and is either quiet or has a romantic atmosphere.
Trendy night spot hunting. Either a shopping spot or a place good for late night, that has either a trendy vibe or serves alcohol.
Tourist entertainment search. Either a diner or a touristy spot, that is either a music venue or serves alcohol.
Connected workspace search. Need a place with TV, free WiFi, and reservations. Should either serve alcohol or have a classy vibe with outdoor seating.
shorthand: AND(HasTV, wifi_'free', RestaurantsReservations, OR(Alcohol, AND(ambience_classy, OutdoorSeating)))

text: Sweet treat hunt. Looking for a place without wheelchair access that's good for dessert. Either upscale or with outdoor seating but no reservations needed.
Classy French outing. Need a classy French place. Either touristy or with outdoor seating but no reservations needed.
Casual hipster hangout. Looking for a casual hipster place. Either upscale or a shopping spot with no reservations needed.
Reserved evening plans. Need a place without wheelchair access that takes reservations. Either upscale or with no happy hour but outdoor seating.
Quiet indoor retreat needed. Looking for a quiet place with no outdoor seating. Either serving alcohol or wheelchair accessible with no reservations needed.
Traditional American comfort food. Need a traditional American place without happy hour. Either touristy or with free WiFi but no reservations needed.
Adult night out planned. Looking for an adult-only place that's indoor, no dogs allowed. Either good for late night or a moderate-noise restaurant.
shorthand: AND(no_GoodForKids, no_DogsAllowed, no_OutdoorSeating, OR(goodformeal_latenight, AND(noiselevel_average, cat_restaurants)))

text: Dog-friendly indoor spot. Need a dog-friendly place with no outdoor seating. Either with a touristy vibe or a group-friendly restaurant.
Late night bar crawl. Looking for a bar that takes reservations. Either good for late night or a non-trendy pub.
